description: Explore the role of TENDER, a digital currency, in modern cyber conflicts, its implications for global security, and adaptive strategies for nations in the emerging cyberwarfare landscape.
keywords: TENDER, cyberwarfare, digital currencies, global security, cyber conflict, decentralization, anonymity, economic impact, state-sponsored operations, hacktivism, proxy warfare
title: The Currency of Cyberwar: Understanding TENDER and Its Implications in a New Era of Conflict
